title: Should I say Ghufranak first or the dua of wudu after coming out of washroom? assim al hakeem
transcript: so my question is if I I use the restroom and I um I after using the restroom at the same time I do W and coming out of the restroom I'm supposed to say um but at the same time I want to say after which one do I do first after coming out of the restroom the first thing you do is say and then you say the Dua of inah
